articles.title: Don Lemon to return to CNN after formal training following sexist comments, network boss says
articles.description: CNN anchor Don Lemon will return to the network's air on Wednesday after he participates in formal training following sexist comments he made last week, the network's chief executive, Chris Licht, said in an email to employees Monday night.
articles.content:
New York CNN —
CNN anchor Don Lemon will return to the network’s air on Wednesday after he participates in formal training following sexist comments he made last week, the network’s chief executive, Chris Licht, said in an email to employees Monday n... [2429 chars]

articles.title: Don Lemon Will Return to CNN on Wednesday After Uproar
articles.description: CNN’s chairman, Chris Licht, said in a Monday night memo that the anchor “has agreed to participate in formal training” after making on-air comments widely regarded as sexist.
articles.content:
The CNN anchor Don Lemon will return to his regular morning-show role on Wednesday, the network announced late Monday night, after an uproar over a series of comments he made on the air last week about women and aging.
In a terse, 75-word memo sent a... [590 chars]

articles.title: James O’Keefe, Project Veritas Founder, Removed by Board
articles.description: James O'Keefe of Project Veritas says he was removed by the organization's board
articles.content:
James O’Keefe, the political activist who founded the right-wing action group Project Veritas, has been forced out of leadership by the organization’s board, he said on Monday.

articles.title: Hayden Panettiere's brother Jansen Panettiere has died
articles.description: Jansen Panettiere, an established voice-over actor who had a role in "Ice Age: The Meltdown" and was brother to actress Hayden Panettiere, has died, according to Kasey Kitchen, a representative for Hayden Panettiere. He was reportedly 28.
articles.content:

articles.title: Reckitt recalls baby formula over possible contamination with deadly bacteria
articles.description: Nutrition product manufacturer Reckitt is voluntarily recalling baby formula after the product was possibly contaminated with Cronobacter sakazakii, a bacteria that can be life-threatening among young children.
articles.content:
(NEXSTAR) – Nutrition product manufacturer Reckitt is voluntarily recalling baby formula after the product was possibly contaminated with Cronobacter sakazakii, a bacteria that can be life-threatening among young children.

articles.title: Blast at Ohio factory scatters molten debris, starts fire; 14 injured
articles.description: An explosion tore through an Ohio metals plant on Monday, scattering molten metal and debris that rained down on neighboring buildings and injuring at least 14 people, mostly with burns, officials and witnesses said.
articles.content:
[1/6] Firefighters stand around the rubble at the I. Schumann & Co. metals plant after an explosion at the factory in Bedford, Ohio, U.S., February 20, 2023. REUTERS/Aaron Josefczyk

articles.title: 13 people taken to hospitals after explosion and fire at Ohio factory
articles.description: Thirteen people were taken to local hospitals after an explosion at a metal factory near Oakwood, Ohio, according to Captain Brian DiRocco with the Oakwood Village Fire Department.
articles.content:
CNN —
Thirteen people were taken to local hospitals after an explosion at a metal factory near Oakwood, Ohio, according to Captain Brian DiRocco with the Oakwood Village Fire Department.
